feed.title: From block 0 to block 72499 the Merkle root is the same as the coinbase transaction id. Why is that?

entry.title: From block 0 to block 72499 the Merkle root is the same as the coinbase transaction id. Why is that?
entry.summary: In a Bitcoin-development mailing list, Peter Grigor explains that only certain transactions in the Bitcoin blockchain have associated Coinbase transactions and nothing else. The merkle root of a tree with just one item is the hash of that item. The context does not provide any further information regarding the topic.
